website_summaries.verdict: Don't let this watch's simplistic style or somewhat delicate crystal stop you if you want an affordable Movado, as it's beautiful and about half the price of some other styles by the brand.
pros: This watch is one of the less pricey versions of the Movado Museum collection, but no less fashionable
Features a streamlined design, black dial and strap, and silver-tone case that make it ideal to wear with numerous fashions
cons: A few owners gripe that the crystal tends to scratch easily

customer_reviews.title: Uber sensitive to simply washing my hands.
customer_reviews.text: Deeply disappointed. I have wanted this Movado for a long time. Most unhappy with how it settled on my wrist, alway slipped to sit at the side. More significantly, it reacted to me washing my hands, though it did not get wet, The moisture from simply washing clouded the crystal. If I could return it I would,
customer_reviews.author: Elise Blumenthal

customer_reviews.title: Elegant yet practical.
customer_reviews.text: I very much like the watch face and the leather band. It has a simple but elegant look and it is quite easy to see the time. Many of the newer watches crowd the watch face with designs and program buttons making it very difficult to see the time. It also works well with any part of my wardrobe. I am very pleased with it and with the price for a quality Movado watch. It also makes for a lovely gift as the packaging is quite impressive as well.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis Smith

customer_reviews.title: We both love them. And you can’t beat the low price
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Men’s watch for me and the Women’s watch for my other half. We both love them. And you can’t beat the low price. They usually cost from $500 and up for each individual watch. I recommend both watches. 😊👍🏼👍🏼
customer_reviews.author: Othoniel S.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I was worried because I have an eight inch wrist. However, the fit works in the last hole of the band. It looks and works nice. It was preset. So I did not have to worry about the time..
customer_reviews.author: H

customer_reviews.title: Elegant Watch!
customer_reviews.text: I got this watch for my Honey for her birthday this October and she loves it. The watch is a fine work of art and it was sent in a fine box and package well. I am very satisfied. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Tyger

customer_reviews.title: FAKE MOVADO!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This watch is not the same watch as what’s in the photo! This watch is a fake Movado! A real Movado watch will say “ SWISS MOVADO MADE “ on the face of the watch! I paid $250 for a fake!!! Yet the listing description states authentic Movado watch!!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Face way too big for a small wrist. Over 1in.
customer_reviews.author: flowerpdler

customer_reviews.title: Looks very classy
customer_reviews.text: Love my watch very classy Fits just right I have recieved many compliments. Great quality authentic Movado
customer_reviews.author: Gabby Trivisonno

customer_reviews.title: Its a fake!!
customer_reviews.text: The item is a made in China reproduction. They didn't even try to hide it. There was a made in China sticker on back if watch. Not exactly worth 200+ dollars.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen S.

customer_reviews.title: Very classy
customer_reviews.text: Classy and elegant, can be worn with a dress or jeans.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Star

customer_reviews.title: It had a very cheap look about it like it was going to break in a second
customer_reviews.text: It had a very cheap look about it like it was going to break in a second
customer_reviews.author: Miss luvell

customer_reviews.title: Delivered on time and no issues with the watch.
customer_reviews.text: Received on time and quality was very good as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Darryl Smith

customer_reviews.title: SIZE
customer_reviews.text: Nice watch. However Picture does not really give the right Idea on the size of the watch. Its in the smaller side of the spectrum for sure. Face of the watch does not get to a nickel size...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great looking watch for the price.
customer_reviews.text: A very classy look. Gets lots of compliments. So far, I find no fault at all with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs C.

customer_reviews.title: Movado Watch
customer_reviews.text: I adore my new watch in all its quality and simplicity.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Edwards

customer_reviews.title: My son got a watch that looked just like this one and it is not authentic Movado
customer_reviews.text: Buyer be ware!!!! My son got a watch that looked just like this one and it is not authentic Movado!!!
customer_reviews.author: Frank White

customer_reviews.title: Fake Watch
customer_reviews.text: A simple Google search implies that if it says "swiss MOVADO quartz" it is fake and you should not buy.
customer_reviews.author: Royal Master
